topics.body:
Never actually played D&D but I'm just going off of what little knowledge I have from Final Fantasy in all honesty

I always loved the healing/support role, everyone is so focused on attacking and I know in an actual real life situation I have no physical ability whatsoever so I'd be content with just keeping everyone else up as long as possible
